title: B.A.B.S
overview: BABS is a feel-good series about Loek New Hague, who married men as Special Officer of the Civil Registry. He is popular as BABS, because he lookalike is a famous actor who plays the lead role in the very popular Dutch film 'Forever Connected. The famous wedding scene from that movie for many people the epitome of romance. Therefore Loek, traveling at the request of trouwlustigen, weddings down to replay the scene.
